mil.emp3.api.listeners

Interface IEditEventListener


  • public interface IEditEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process edit events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEditCancel(IMap map, IFeature originalFeature)
      This method is called when the edit session is canceled.
      void onEditComplete(IMap map, IFeature feature)
      This method is called when the edit session is finished.
      void onEditError(IMap map, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      This method is called if an error is encountered.
      void onEditStart(IMap map)
      This method is called when the edit session begins.
      void onEditUpdate(IMap map, IFeature feature, java.util.List<IEditUpdateData> updateList)
      This method is called each time the feature is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onEditStart

        void onEditStart(IMap map)
        This method is called when the edit session begins.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.

      • onEditUpdate

        void onEditUpdate(IMap map,
                IFeature feature,
                java.util.List<IEditUpdateData> updateList)
        This method is called each time the feature is changed.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        updateList - This parameter contains a list of changes. see IEditUpdateData

      • onEditComplete

        void onEditComplete(IMap map,
                  IFeature feature)
        This method is called when the edit session is finished.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        feature - This parameter is the newly edited feature.

      • onEditCancel

        void onEditCancel(IMap map,
                IFeature originalFeature)
        This method is called when the edit session is canceled.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        originalFeature - This parameter is the feature as it was before the session started.

      • onEditError

        void onEditError(IMap map,
               java.lang.String errorMessage)
        This method is called if an error is encountered.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        errorMessage - A text description of the error.
